title: Patton Oswalt Reveals His Wife's Cause Of Death
text:
Our heart goes out to Patton Oswalt for his horrible loss…
As we reported , in April 2016, the comedian's wife Michelle McNamara passed away at the age of 46. According to a spokesperson, her death "was a complete shock to her family and friends, who loved her dearly."
Related: Patton Oswalt Gives A Shoutout To His Daughter & Late Wife 
On Friday, the actor revealed that Michelle died from a combination of prescription medications — including Adderall, Xanax, and the pain medication fentanyl — and an undiagnosed heart condition. He said: 
"We learned today the combination of drugs in Michelle's system, along with a condition we were unaware of, proved lethal." 
It's important to note that Los Angeles coroner Lt. David Smith still lists McNamara's cause of death as pending.
R.I.P. Michelle.
